So in terms of the professional services, its like mixing and mastering or audio editing, which is its something that not a lot of people understand within the music industry, but when someone makes a song and someone finishes it finalizes, the writing, the recording and all that stuff, they have to get it mixed. So mixing is the process of taking all the stems, all the instruments, all the vocals, and adding effects, adding certain things to make them all mesh well together. And then once you get it mixed where all the stems are working together, you get it mastered so that all the songs within the project can all sound cohesive. Okay, so thats what I do. Thats my specialization. I also specialize in vocal editing, things like that. Like when a singer does a song and they record layers and layers and harmonies and backgrounds and all that, I edit, make them sound clean, very tight, fix any tuning, pitch wise, any rhythmic issues and things like that. And overall, make it sound polished.
